edu.ncsu.csc.itrust.action

类 AddPatientAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc.itrust.action.AddPatientAction

  • public class AddPatientAction
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for Add Patient page (addPatient.jsp). This just adds an empty patient, creates a random password for that patient. Very similar to AddOfficeVisitAction
    作者:
    Andy Meneely

    • 方法详细资料

      • addPatient

        public long addPatient(PatientBean p)
                throws DBException,
                       FormValidationException
        Creates a new patient, returns the new MID. Adds a new user to the table along with a random password.
        返回:
        the new MID of the patient
        抛出:
        DBException
        FormValidationException
